Class Network

    public abstract class Network
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Base neural network class.

    Diego Catalano edited by Thomas Volkmann

      • onSelfTest

        public boolean onSelfTest(java.util.ArrayList<PatternHelper> validationList,
                          java.lang.Boolean flag)
        Check the neural network with already seen pattern for self test, if the #INTENDED_PERCENTAGE_MATCH is reached the network stop learning. After finished training mode the network will categorize the screenshots in recognized and unrecognized.
        Parameters:
        validationList - ArrayList of patterns which are used for counter example calculation.
        flag - Use of Constants.NETWORK_MODE.
        Returns:
        selfTest Boolean flag for self test or not.

      • scanFolderForChanges

        public java.util.ArrayList<FastBitmap> scanFolderForChanges(java.lang.String path,
                                                            java.lang.String screenshotName)
        Scan the given parameter path for images which are allowed after Helper.IMAGE_FILTER and compare all of them with the internal list. If the images are in the list nothing is done otherwise the HashCode of the images will be added to the list. This method is used for folder oversee.
        Parameters:
        path - String to the folder to scan
        screenshotName - current screenshot ge added before saving in the folder, important for the next use of the network.
        Returns:
        result list with all loaded images.

      • scanFolderForChanges

        public java.util.ArrayList<FastBitmap> scanFolderForChanges(java.lang.String path)
        Scan the given parameter path for images which are allowed after Helper.IMAGE_FILTER and load them into a ArrayList.
        Parameters:
        path - Full path name to the folder to scan.
        Returns:
        result ArrayList of FastBitmap.

      • setInternalList

        public void setInternalList(java.util.ArrayList<PatternHelper> list)
        Internal list for self test.
        Parameters:
        list - with all processed images.
